SEARCH
Package com.kraken.krakenhax

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.kraken.krakenhax.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class Event extends Object implements android.os.Parcelable
Represents an event in the KrakenHax application. Stores event metadata such as title, categories, timeframe, description, location, and registration radius. Each event may also have associated participant lists (WaitList, WonList, LostList, CancelList) and a poster image.

Used by organizers to create and manage events, and by entrants to view and join them.

    • CREATOR

      public static final android.os.Parcelable.Creator<Event> CREATOR
      A Parcelable.Creator that generates instances of Event from a Parcel.

      This is required for passing Event objects between Android components, such as when navigating between fragments or activities.

    • Event

      public Event(String id, String title, String eventDetails, String location, Integer radius, String poster)
      Lightweight constructor for creating fake/local events.
      Parameters:
      id - a String representing the unique identifier for the event
      title - a String representing the event title
      eventDetails - a String representing the event details (uses empty string if null)
      location - a String representing the event location (uses empty string if null)
      radius - an Integer representing the event's radius (uses 0 if null)
      poster - a String representing the URL or path to the event's poster image

    • describeContents

      public int describeContents()
      Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of writeToParcel(Parcel, int), the return value of this method must include the Parcelable.CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR bit.
      Specified by:
      describeContents in interface android.os.Parcelable
      Returns:
      a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance.

    • getWaitList

      public ArrayList<Profile> getWaitList()
      Retrieves the WaitList associated with this event. The waitlist contains entrants who have registered but are not yet confirmed.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList for this event's WaitList

    • getCancelList

      public ArrayList<Profile> getCancelList()
      Retrieves the CancelList associated with this event. This list tracks entrants who have cancelled their registration.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList for this event's CancelList

    • getWonList

      public ArrayList<Profile> getWonList()
      Retrieves the WonList associated with this event. This list contains entrants who have been selected to participate.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList for this event's WonList

    • getLostList

      public ArrayList<Profile> getLostList()
      Retrieves the LostList associated with this event. This list stores entrants who were not selected after the lottery draw.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList for this event's LostList

    • getAcceptList

      public ArrayList<Profile> getAcceptList()
      Retrieves the AcceptList associated with this event. This list stores entrants who accepted their entry after the draw.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList for this event's AcceptList

    • addToAcceptList

      public void addToAcceptList(Profile profile)
      Adds a profile to the AcceptList if they are currently in the WonList. When a profile accepts their invitation, they are moved from the WonList to the AcceptList.
      Parameters:
      profile - the Profile to be added to the AcceptList

    • addToCancelList

      public void addToCancelList(Profile profile)
      Adds a profile to the CancelList if they are currently in the WonList. When a winner cancels, they are moved from WonList to CancelList and a replacement winner is drawn from the LostList.
      Parameters:
      profile - the Profile to be added to the CancelList

    • addToWaitList

      public void addToWaitList(Profile profile)
      Adds a profile to the WaitList for this event. If a waitlist capacity is set and the waitlist is full, an exception is thrown. Duplicate profiles are not allowed.
      Parameters:
      profile - the Profile to be added to the WaitList
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the waitlist is full or the profile is already on the waitlist

    • removeFromWaitList

      public void removeFromWaitList(Profile profile)
      Removes a profile from the WaitList.
      Parameters:
      profile - the Profile to be removed from the WaitList

    • drawLottery

      public void drawLottery(ArrayList<Profile> entrantPool, Integer numberOfWinners)
      Draws the lottery for the event, selecting a number of winners from the entrant pool. Winners are added to the wonList, and all the losers replace the existing lostList.
      Parameters:
      entrantPool - List of Profiles who signed up for the lottery.
      numberOfWinners - The number of winners to be selected from the entrant pool.

    • setWaitListCap

      public void setWaitListCap(int cap)
      Sets the maximum capacity for the waitlist. A value of 0 or less indicates no capacity limit.
      Parameters:
      cap - an integer representing the maximum number of entrants allowed on the waitlist

    • getWaitListCap

      public int getWaitListCap()
      Returns the maximum capacity for the waitlist.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the waitlist capacity (0 or less means unlimited)

    • setWinnerNumber

      public void setWinnerNumber(int num)
      Sets the number of winners to be selected in the lottery draw.
      Parameters:
      num - an integer representing the number of winners to select

    • getWinnerNumber

      public int getWinnerNumber()
      Returns the number of winners to be selected in the lottery draw.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the number of winners

    • setUseGeolocation

      public void setUseGeolocation(boolean use)
      Sets whether geolocation verification is required for this event.
      Parameters:
      use - a boolean indicating if geolocation should be used (true) or not (false)

    • getUseGeolocation

      public boolean getUseGeolocation()
      Returns whether geolocation verification is required for this event.
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating if geolocation is used

    • setOrgId

      Parameters:
      orgId - a String representing the unique ID of the organizer

      Returns the organizer ID for this event.

      a String representing the organizer's unique ID

      Parameters:

      Sets the date and time when the event takes place.
      Parameters:

    • getDateTime

      Returns the date and time when the event takes place.

    • getDateCreated

      Returns the date and time when this event was created.
      Returns:
      a Timestamp representing the event creation date

    • lookupOrganizer

      public void lookupOrganizer(Event.OrganizerCallback callback)
      Looks up the organizer for the event from the organizer ID. Asynchronously retrieves the organizer's Profile from Firebase Firestore and returns it via the provided callback.
      Parameters:
      callback - the OrganizerCallback to handle the result or error

    • writeToParcel

      public void writeToParcel(@NonNull android.os.Parcel dest, int flags)
      Writes the Event object's data into a Parcel, allowing it to be serialized and passed between Android components.

      Note: The Bitmap poster is excluded from parceling for efficiency.

      Specified by:
      writeToParcel in interface android.os.Parcelable
      Parameters:
      dest - The Parcel object in which the Event data should be written.
      flags - Additional flags about how the object should be written.
